Rental Conditions

Driver Requirements

  • Valid driver's license (minimum 2 years)
  • Passport or national ID
  • Minimum age: 25 years
  • Clean driving record

Insurance & Security

  • Comprehensive insurance included
  • Security deposit: $500–$2000 (vehicle dependent)
  • Fully refundable upon return
  • Additional coverage options available

Usage Terms

  • Daily mileage: 200 km included
  • Additional km: $0.50–$1.00 per km
  • Fuel: Return with same level
  • No smoking in vehicles
